Backwards Incompatible Changes¶

Translation table rename¶

In revision 98 the default name for translation tables was changed: instead of “modeltranslation” it is now “model_translation”. You don’t have to rename your tables, just upgrade to DM revision 102 or later and add a Meta class within your translation model:

class MyModel(models.Model):
    [...]
    class Translation(multilingual.Translation):
        my_field = ...
        class Meta:
            db_table="my_modeltranslation"

Note that this “class Meta” is inside the inner Translation class.
